tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Biological_Pathways (
    pathway_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    pathway_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
  interaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_id1 UUID,
  gene_id2 UUID,
  interaction_type STRING,
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id1) REFERENCES Genes(gene_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id2) REFERENCES Genes(gene_id)
);
